translation.en: It's always better on the piano, I don't know why. [sniffles]
translation.zh:
用钢琴弹出来的总是更加悦耳
我也不知道为什么

translation.en: So to...
translation.zh: 好 针对…

translation.en: answer your question, yes, I carry her around with me quite a bit.
translation.zh:
你提出的问题 是的
她的身影常会陪伴在我左右

translation.en: I've often seen her in the garden working.
translation.zh: 我常会看到她在花园里忙碌

translation.en: Julia Vega swears that she's at the top of the stairs every morning
translation.zh:
胡丽亚·维嘎发誓说
每天早上她下来洗衣服时

translation.en: when she comes down to do the laundry,
translation.zh: 费利西亚总是站在楼梯顶部

translation.en: making sure she's separating the whites and the darks.
translation.zh: 以确保她把白色和深色的衣服分开

translation.en: And our children are very jealous because they've never seen her.
translation.zh:
我们的孩子们很嫉妒这点
因为他们从来都看不到她
我…

translation.en: I miss her terribly.
translation.zh: 非常想念她

translation.en: [Leonard] Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Yes, I'm aware.
translation.zh: 是的 我知道

translation.en: Can you hold on one second, please?
translation.zh: 能请你稍等一下吗？

translation.en: That's terrible news. Is he gonna be okay?
translation.zh: 这太糟糕了 他不会有事吧？

translation.en: No, I understand.
translation.zh: 不 我理解

translation.en: And no chance for a rehearsal?
translation.zh: 没机会排练吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: May I get three tickets for today?
translation.zh: 能不能给我三张今天的票？

translation.en: [chuckles] Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: All right, yes, thank you.
translation.zh: 好 是 谢谢

translation.en: You got 'em, boy!
translation.zh: 小子 机会来了！

translation.en: -Leonard, bellissimo. -Oh, yes.
translation.zh:
-伦纳德 你真帅
-是的

translation.en: Did you get any sleep?
translation.zh: 你有没有睡一下？

translation.en: No, I didn't get any sleep, Bruno. "Manfred" starts on the downbeat rest,
translation.zh:
没 布鲁诺 我一点没睡
《曼弗雷德》以强拍休止符开场

translation.en: and you didn't get me any rehearsal with the orchestra.
translation.zh: 你却没让我跟乐队一起排练

translation.en: I told you you were going on.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你你会上

translation.en: No, you told me it was a possibility.
translation.zh: 不 你说的是有这个可能

translation.en: [announcer] Good afternoon.
translation.zh: 下午好

translation.en: United States Rubber Company again invites you to Carnegie Hall,
translation.zh:
美国橡胶公司再次邀请各位
来到卡内基音乐厅

translation.en: to hear a concert of the New York Philharmonic Symphony Orchestra
translation.zh:
聆听由阿图尔·罗津斯基
担任音乐总监的

translation.en: of which Artur Rodziński is musical director.
translation.zh: 纽约爱乐交响乐团的演奏

translation.en: Bruno Walter, who was to have conducted this afternoon, is ill,
translation.zh:
今天下午原本该由
布鲁诺·瓦尔特担任指挥 但他病了

translation.en: and his place will be taken by the young American-born assistant conductor
translation.zh:
他的位置将由在美国出生的
爱乐交响乐团的

translation.en: of the Philharmonic Symphony, Leonard Bernstein.
translation.zh:
年轻助理指挥
伦纳德·伯恩斯坦接替

translation.en: Today, you were here for an historic performance.
translation.zh:
今天 你们欣赏到的
是一场历史性的演出

translation.en: This performance that was fantastic was broadcast all over the world.
translation.zh: 这场精彩的表演已在全世界播出

translation.en: And I feel obliged to say that Maestro Bernstein
translation.zh: 我觉得有必要提一句 伯恩斯坦大师

translation.en: was called this morning at 9:30
translation.zh: 是今天早上九点半才接到电话

translation.en: and he was told that he would actually conduct here
translation.zh: 通知他要来这里指挥的

translation.en: -for the first time after many years-- -Without rehearsal.
translation.zh:
-这是他多年来的第一场演出…
-而且都没排练

translation.en: -Without rehearsal. -[crowd laughing]
translation.zh: 而且都没排练过

translation.en: But he loves the music, he doesn't need rehearsal,
translation.zh: 但他热爱交响乐 他不需要排练

translation.en: he feels it so much.
translation.zh: 他对作品有很强的感觉

translation.en: And after many years, he really wanted this,
translation.zh: 这么多年了 他真的很想要这个机会

translation.en: it has happened and I'm so proud.
translation.zh: 也得到了这个机会 我感到非常骄傲

translation.en: Carnegie Hall is so proud of you and New York is proud of you.
translation.zh:
卡内基音乐厅很为你感到骄傲
纽约为你感到骄傲

translation.en: Leonard Bernstein.
translation.zh: 伦纳德·伯恩斯坦

translation.en: -[all applauding] -Thank you. Thank you. Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢 谢谢大家

translation.en: I'll tell you fellas, I don't remember a thing after that downbeat rest.
translation.zh:
跟你们说 那强拍休止符之后的事
我一样都不记得了

translation.en: I must've blacked out and then when the audience applauded I came to.
translation.zh:
我准是晕了过去
直到观众鼓掌 我才醒过来

translation.en: Don't let this get in the way. We're on a roll here, baby.
translation.zh: 别让这事妨碍我们 我们最近很顺利 宝贝

translation.en: I wanna choreograph the segment with the dancers while in Cincinnati.
translation.zh:
我希望趁我去辛辛那提的机会
跟舞者们一起编最后那段

translation.en: Jerry, I'm in love with the music. I told you.
translation.zh:
好吧 杰瑞 可我爱上了那音乐
我跟你说过了

translation.en: As soon as I have something, I'll record and send it to you.
translation.zh:
我一有创意
就会写好 录下来 发给你

translation.en: This the new ballet he's composing?
translation.zh: 这说的是他在创作的新芭蕾舞剧？

translation.en: About three sailors on leave in New York getting up to no good?
translation.zh:
关于三名在纽约休假的水手
做坏事的那部？

translation.en: -That's the one. -Don't argue with him.
translation.zh:
-就是那部
-杰瑞 别跟他争

translation.en: He's a young man to be reckoned with. You can read it here.
translation.zh:
他可是个不可忽视的年轻人
报纸上写着 你可以过来看

translation.en: -David, please. -"Bernstein shows mastery of score."
translation.zh:
-大卫 别
-“伯恩斯坦展示驾驭整曲能力”

translation.en: "Youthful conductor carries out an exacting program--"
translation.zh: “年轻指挥担起救场重任…”

translation.en: Sure, right next to Hitler's bombing of Poland.
translation.zh:
那是 就登在
希特勒轰炸波兰的报道边上

translation.en: -[knock on door] -Come on in, it's open.
translation.zh: 进来吧 门开着

translation.en: -Sorry, gentlemen-- -No, no, he likes leaving the door open.
translation.zh:
-抱歉 先生们…
-没事 他喜欢开着门

translation.en: Hey, Isaac, you know David and that's Jerry Robbins.
translation.zh:
嗨 艾萨克 大卫你认识的
那一位是杰瑞·罗宾斯

translation.en: -Hi. -Hello. We've got to get downstairs.
translation.zh:
-你好
-你好 听着 我们得下楼了

translation.en: -You're an hour late-- -I'm just working on the score--
translation.zh:
-你晚了一小时…
-我只是在谱曲…

translation.en: -Rodziński's coming early-- -Rodziński's here?
translation.zh:
-罗津斯基来早了…
-罗津斯基来了？

translation.en: -Okay, I'll be down in a second. -Isaac.
translation.zh:
-好 我马上下去
-艾萨克

translation.en: Don't forget your show pony here is a composer.
translation.zh:
别忘了你叫去表演的这家伙
是位作曲家

translation.en: I'm learning not to do it so hard, right?
translation.zh: 我在学着别用力过猛 对吧？

translation.en: -It's perfect. -I always get so...
translation.zh:
-很完美
-我总是会…

translation.en: overzealous.
translation.zh: 过于热情

translation.en: -I get too excited. -Right.
translation.zh:
-会太过兴奋
-对

translation.en: Both your feet in my lap. I don't know what to do with it.
translation.zh:
你的两只脚都在我腿上
我都不知道该怎么办了

translation.en: I don't know what to do with myself. It's just too much.
translation.zh:
我不知道该拿自己怎么办
任务太重了

translation.en: -I think-- -It's too much for one man.
translation.zh:
-我觉得…
-一个人没法应付得了

translation.en: -Because it was on the liver spot? -No.
translation.zh:
-因为在黃褐斑上？
-不是的

translation.en: It's too much for one man to take. Honestly, David.
translation.zh: 一个人没法承受得了 真的 大卫

translation.en: I mean, I'll never leave the apartment.
translation.zh: 我永远别想离开这公寓了

translation.en: -That's the reality. -Please don't.
translation.zh:
-这就是现实
-请别离开

translation.en: Dear Jerry,
translation.zh: 亲爱的杰瑞

translation.en: this is an impromptu apology for the record
translation.zh: 这是对这段录音的即兴道歉

translation.en: which isn't so very bad, but it's not so very good either.
translation.zh: 曲子本身没那么糟 但也不算很好

translation.en: I'm looking through the score now, exhausted,
translation.zh: 我现在在翻看曲谱 我累坏了

translation.en: and everything's okay up to number three
translation.zh: 一切都还行 直到第三乐章

translation.en: when all the counterpoint comes in with the two pianos.
translation.zh: 两架钢琴开始演奏对位曲时

translation.en: I'm afraid it's sort of messy there.
translation.zh: 这一段恐怕显得有点乱

translation.en: Anyway, it's hard to do on two pianos,
translation.zh: 总之 用两架钢琴很难做到

translation.en: so with an orchestra, I think it'll be very clear.
translation.zh:
如果改成管弦乐队演奏
我觉得就会非常清晰

translation.en: And pardon all the mistakes.
translation.zh: 所有的错误请你包涵

translation.en: But it was all Aaron Copland's fault. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 但这都要怪阿隆·科普兰

translation.en: -[Aaron] It was all my fault. -And there he sits now.
translation.zh:
-都是我的错
-他现在就坐在那里

translation.en: -[Aaron] That's not true. -Anyway...
translation.zh:
-那不是真的
-总之…

translation.en: I'll leave it to you to figure out, Mr. Robbins,
translation.zh: 接下来的事就交给你了 罗宾斯先生

translation.en: how to dance to this type of music, but,
translation.zh:
你来决定
怎么跟着这种音乐编舞 不过

translation.en: give my love to everybody and the thing, and, uh... [chuckles]
translation.zh: 代我向所有人问好 还有那个…

translation.en: I hope you like it. Good luck, Jerry.
translation.zh: 我希望你会喜欢 祝好运 杰瑞

translation.en: All right, got to get to rehearsal.
translation.zh: 好了 该去排练了

translation.en: -I got it. -You do?
translation.zh:
-这里交给我吧
-确定？

translation.en: -Yeah. -You're such a chap.
translation.zh:
-确定
-你真好

translation.en: It's downstairs and you're still going to be late.
translation.zh: 演出就在楼下 可你还是会迟到

translation.en: Put in a word for me with Rodziński.
translation.zh: 替我在罗津斯基那里美言几句

translation.en: I will. I'm not his favorite, but I will.
translation.zh: 我会的 我不是他的最爱 但我会的

translation.en: -Love you, baby. -Love you.
translation.zh:
-我爱你 宝贝
-我也爱你

translation.en: ♪ I try hard to stay controlled ♪
translation.zh: 我努力控制情绪

translation.en: ♪ But I get carried away ♪
translation.zh: 但却忘乎了所以

translation.en: ♪ Try to act aloof and cold ♪
translation.zh: 试图表现得疏远冷漠

translation.en: ♪ But I get carried away ♪
translation.zh: 但却忘乎了所以

translation.en: ♪ Carried away ♪
translation.zh: 忘乎所以

translation.en: ♪ Carried away You get carried, just carried away! ♪
translation.zh:
忘乎所以 你忘乎了所以
忘乎所以！

translation.en: ♪ And when I go to see A moving picture show ♪
translation.zh: 我在看电影表演时

translation.en: ♪ And I'm watching actors in a scene ♪
translation.zh: 看着场景中的演员

translation.en: ♪ I start to think What's happening is really so ♪
translation.zh: 我会开始以为电影里演的是真的

translation.en: ♪ The girl, I must protect her ♪
translation.zh: 我必须保护那姑娘

translation.en: ♪ The villain don't respect her ♪
translation.zh: 那个恶人不尊重她

translation.en: ♪ I leap to her defense ♪
translation.zh: 我跳起身来保卫她

translation.en: ♪ And knock a hole Right through the screen! ♪
translation.zh: 在屏幕上砸出了一个洞！

translation.en: ♪ Carried away, carried away ♪
translation.zh: 忘乎所以 忘乎了所以

translation.en: -♪ He gets carried ♪ -♪ We get carried ♪
translation.zh:
-他忘乎
-我们忘乎

translation.en: ♪ Just carried away! ♪
translation.zh: 就这样忘乎了所以！

translation.en: Brilliant, but... but what no one here knows
translation.zh: 太棒了 不过…这里没人知道的是

translation.en: is how he beat the soprano out of his poor baby sister
translation.zh: 我们小时候 他在歌剧表演中飙高音

translation.en: performing all those operas when we were children.
translation.zh: 比他那可怜的女高音妹妹还厉害

translation.en: Let that be fair warning to you and to everyone.
translation.zh: 你和现场的各位都得当心他呢

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 你好呀

translation.en: Thought you might be here. You've certainly been making the rounds.
translation.zh:
我就知道你可能会来
你肯定一直在各处拜访

translation.en: Have you met the gang?
translation.zh: 你跟大伙儿见过了吗？

translation.en: -No. -Betty and Adolf, they're a riot.
translation.zh:
-还没
-那是贝蒂和阿道夫 他们很风趣

translation.en: -Hello. -Hello.
translation.zh:
-你好
-你好

translation.en: Ellen. Of course, you've run into her at another studio, no doubt.
translation.zh:
那是埃伦 当然了
你肯定在其他工作室遇到过她

translation.en: Hello, Felicia.
translation.zh: 你好 费利西亚

translation.en: Who did I miss? Have I missed anyone?
translation.zh: 还差谁？我有没有漏了谁？

translation.en: Just the piano player.
translation.zh: 只是漏了弹钢琴的

translation.en: [Shirley] Well, I figured you needed no introduction.
translation.zh: 我觉得你不需要我来介绍

translation.en: -Hello. I'm Lenny. -Hello. Felicia.
translation.zh:
-你好 我叫莱尼
-你好 我叫费利西亚

translation.en: Bernstein, like that one.
translation.zh: 我姓伯恩斯坦 跟她一个姓

translation.en: Montealegre.
translation.zh: 我姓蒙泰莱格雷

translation.en: Montealegre?
translation.zh: 蒙泰莱格雷？

translation.en: -Montealegre Cohn. -Cohn?
translation.zh:
-蒙泰莱格雷·科恩
-科恩？

translation.en: Montealegre Cohn.
translation.zh: 蒙泰莱格雷·科恩

translation.en: Well, that's an interesting marriage of words.
translation.zh: 这个姓氏组合很有意思

translation.en: ♪ You've got that look ♪
translation.zh: 你有那种眼神

translation.en: ♪ That look that leaves me weak ♪
translation.zh: 那眼神让我浑身发软

translation.en: ♪ You with your Eyes across the table technique ♪
translation.zh: 你和你那隔桌勾魂的眼神

translation.en: You come from an aristocratic European family on your mother's side,
translation.zh: 你母亲来自一个欧洲贵族家庭

translation.en: and your father is American and he's Jewish
translation.zh: 你的父亲是美国犹太人

translation.en: and you moved to Chile because--
translation.zh: 而你们搬去智利是因为…

translation.en: -It's amazing, I remember all this. -I know.
translation.zh:
-真没想到 我居然全记得
-可不是

translation.en: I don't know how.
translation.zh: 你是怎么做到的？

translation.en: You moved to Chile because of your father's business.
translation.zh: 你们搬去智利 是因为你父亲的生意

translation.en: And now you're firmly planted in New York City studying...
translation.zh: 而现在你已牢牢扎根纽约市 学习…

translation.en: piano, but you're actually studying acting.
translation.zh: 钢琴 但其实你是在学习表演

translation.en: A career which demands the versatility to play a panoply of characters.
translation.zh:
这份职业要求你多才多艺
不然演不了各种角色

translation.en: And that is my conclusion,
translation.zh: 所以 我的结论就是

translation.en: that you, my dear, are very similar to me.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你跟我非常相似

translation.en: -How? -Because you had to take
translation.zh:
-此话怎讲？
-因为你不得不把

translation.en: all the pieces, all the bits of you scattered across these varied landscapes
translation.zh:
散布在那些地方、形状各异的
每一片你的碎片拾掇起来

translation.en: and form, create the veritable person that stands before me now.
translation.zh:
才能塑造出现在站在我面前的
这个真正的你

translation.en: How is that similar?
translation.zh: 这跟你哪里像了？

translation.en: -You just asked me and I told you. -I know. Okay.
translation.zh:
-你刚问了我 我也告诉你了
-我知道 好吧

translation.en: Russian Orthodox Jew.
translation.zh: 你是俄裔 正统犹太教徒

translation.en: -Growing up in Boston. -Oh, someone else was listening.
translation.zh:
-在波士顿长大
-你用心听了

translation.en: -Child of immigrants. -Yes.
translation.zh:
-移民之子
-没错

translation.en: Your father's a self-made businessman.
translation.zh: 你父亲是位白手起家的商人

translation.en: Steeped in Talmud. Harvard.
translation.zh:
喜欢研究《塔木德》
你读的是哈佛大学

translation.en: -Then Curtis School for Music-- -Institute.
translation.zh:
-然后去了柯蒂斯音乐学校…
-学院

translation.en: Institute of Music in Philadelphia.
translation.zh: 在费城的音乐学院

translation.en: Now firmly planted here in New York City pursuing composition and conducting.
translation.zh:
现在扎根纽约市
想成为作曲家和指挥家

translation.en: Under the guise of a concert pianist drawn to this artistic Mecca,
translation.zh:
伪装成被这个艺术圣地所吸引的
音乐会钢琴家

translation.en: fleeing my puritanical origins just like you.
translation.zh: 好远离古板的原生家庭 就跟你一样

translation.en: Surely your family was a tad more supportive.
translation.zh: 你的家人应该更支持你吧？

translation.en: My father imagined me a klezmer, playing for kopecks on the street corner,
translation.zh:
我父亲觉得我是在俄罗斯街角
靠卖艺为生的克里兹莫音乐演奏师

translation.en: desperate for me to join the family business to make a living.
translation.zh:
迫切希望我能加入家族生意
并以此为生

translation.en: What was the family business?
translation.zh: 你们的家族生意是什么？

translation.en: -Samuel J. Bernstein Hair Company. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 塞缪尔·J·伯恩斯坦美发公司

translation.en: -Really? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-真的？
-真的

translation.en: So I had no choice but to become a composite of
translation.zh: 所以我别无选择 只能成为一个

translation.en: adopted speech, manner and outlook on life,
translation.zh:
符合他人言语
举止和人生观标准的复合体

translation.en: a composite, which enables me to be many things at once.
translation.zh:
这个复合体
使我能够同时扮演各种角色

translation.en: And that's why, we, you and I, are able to endure and survive
translation.zh:
这就是你和我能够忍受艰难
生存下来的原因

translation.en: 'cause the world wants us to be only one thing and I find that deplorable.
translation.zh:
因为世界希望我们只扮演一种角色
我觉得这很可悲

translation.en: I find you very attractive, Felicia.
translation.zh: 我觉得你很有吸引力 费利西亚

translation.en: ♪ Carried away, carried away ♪
translation.zh: 忘乎所以 忘乎了所以

translation.en: ♪ You got carried away ♪
translation.zh: 你忘乎了所以

translation.en: It's really too much. I'm very sorry.
translation.zh: 他们太吵了 我很抱歉

translation.en: Wait! Wait!
translation.zh: 等一下！

translation.en: Go! Go! Go!
translation.zh: 快上！

translation.en: Oh, I like that.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢那个

translation.en: You've a lot of energy, have to tell you.
translation.zh: 我得说 你的精力非常充沛

translation.en: I'm just following you. I don't know where.
translation.zh:
我只是跟着你
都不知道我们要去哪儿

translation.en: I've never been in this part of town.

从那一天起
他就在世界各地指挥、演奏

translation.en: And he's written symphonies, ballets, and opera,

translation.en: as well as scores for the Broadway musical Wonderful Town
translation.zh: 以及百老汇音乐剧《美妙的小镇》

translation.en: Well, I think...
translation.zh: 我觉得…

translation.en: -that you're letting your sadness get-- -Oh, stop it!
translation.zh:
-你在任由自己的悲伤…
-得了吧！

translation.en: -Let me finish... -That has nothing to do with me...
translation.zh:
-让我说完…
-这两者完全没…

translation.en: -...what I'm going to say. I think... -No.
translation.zh:
-…我想要说的话 我觉得…
-不

translation.en: ...you're letting your sadness get the better of you.
translation.zh:
…你在任由自己的悲伤
战胜你的理智

translation.en: It's about you, so you should love it.
translation.zh:
跟我无关 全是因为你
所以你应该喜欢才对

translation.en: You want to be sleepless and depressed and sick.
translation.zh: 你想要失眠、抑郁、生病

translation.en: So you can avoid fulfilling your obligations.
translation.zh: 这样你就不用履行自己的义务

translation.en: -What obligations? -To what you've been given.
translation.zh:
-什么义务？
-对赐予你的东西的义务

translation.en: The gift that you've been given.
translation.zh: 对你的天赋的义务

translation.en: -Please. -My God.
translation.zh:
-得了吧
-老天

translation.en: The gift comes with burdens. Do you have any idea?
translation.zh: 这天赋伴随着负担 你知道吗？

translation.en: -The burden of feigning honesty and love. -Sorry, that's the truth.
translation.zh:
-假装坦诚、假装爱的负担
-抱歉 但这是事实

translation.en: That above all you love people and from that wellspring of love
translation.zh:
尽管你喜欢与人相处
而且内心充满了爱

translation.en: the complications arise in your life.
translation.zh: 生活中还是出现了各种难题与麻烦

translation.en: -That's exactly right. -Wake up! Take off your glasses.
translation.zh:
-正是如此
-醒醒吧！把眼镜摘了

translation.en: Hate in your heart. Hate in your heart and anger.
translation.zh:
你的内心充满仇恨
你内心充满了仇恨和愤怒

translation.en: There's so many things, it's hard to count.
translation.zh:
恨的东西太多 都数不清了
这就是你的动力

translation.en: That's what drives you. Deep, deep anger drives you.
translation.zh: 是深深的愤怒在驱使着你

translation.en: You aren't on that podium allowing us to experience the music
translation.zh: 在指挥台上时 你并没让听众听到

translation.en: the way it was intended. You are throwing it in our faces.
translation.zh:
创作时想要表达的情感
你是在对着我们发泄愤怒

translation.en: -How dare you? -How much we'll never be able to
translation.zh:
-你怎么敢说这番话！
-有多少乐章

translation.en: ever understand and by us witnessing you do it so effortlessly,
translation.zh:
我们将永远都无法理解
我们见证你轻而易举地做到这一点

translation.en: you hope that we will know, really know, deep in our core
translation.zh:
你希望我们会知道
希望我们会发自内心地领悟到

translation.en: -how less than we all are for you. -That's your issue.
translation.zh:
-我们对你来说有多不重要
-这就是你的问题

translation.en: -And it's your hubris-- -Join the crowd.
translation.zh:
-而且是你的傲慢…
-加入那帮人吧

translation.en: You prance around with all your dewy-eyed waiters that Harry corrals for you
translation.zh:
你整天跟哈里给你找的
那些满眼天真的男服务员欢蹦乱跳

translation.en: under the guise they have something intellectual to offer you
translation.zh:
搞得好像他们是年轻才俊
能给你什么启迪

translation.en: -while you are "teaching" them. -Well, at least my heart is open.
translation.zh:
-其实是你在“教”他们
-至少我的心是敞开的

translation.en: The audacity to say that!
translation.zh: 你竟然好意思说这话！

translation.en: Have you forgotten about the four years
translation.zh: 难道你忘了

translation.en: where you couldn't decide if you wanted to marry me?
translation.zh: 犹豫要不要娶我的那四年了吗？

translation.en: -That's what I think. -The idea of you?
translation.zh:
-这就是我的想法
-我想象中的你？

translation.en: The Chamberlain movie we saw last week,
translation.zh: 我们上周看的张伯伦的电影里

translation.en: he said, "How could I compete with the man you think I am?"
translation.zh:
他说：“我要怎么跟
你想象中的我竞争呢？” 还好当时我遇到了迪克
才他妈熬过了你的犹豫不决

translation.en: Thank God I met Dick so I could fucking survive your indecision.
translation.zh:
还好当时我遇到了迪克
才他妈熬过了你的犹豫不决

translation.en: -Dick Hart. Richard Hart. -Yes.
translation.zh:
-迪克·哈特 理查德·哈特
-是的

translation.en: -Who fucking died. -Who loved me.
translation.zh:
-他都他妈死了
-他爱我

translation.en: -Who died. -Who loved me.
translation.zh:
-他死了
-他爱我

translation.en: Yeah, he's a corpse now and I was the one who was a fool
translation.zh:
是哦 他现在是具尸体
而那个当年在医院外面

translation.en: waiting outside the fucking hospital for you like an idiot in my truth.
translation.zh:
像白痴一样等你的傻瓜是我
是真实的我

translation.en: Your truth is a fucking lie!
translation.zh: 真实的你是个该死的谎言！

translation.en: It sucks up the energy in every room and gives the rest of us zero opportunity
translation.zh:
它吸光了每个房间的能量
害得我们其他人没一点机会

translation.en: to live or even breathe as our true selves.
translation.zh: 以真我的身份生活 甚至是呼吸

translation.en: Your truth makes you brave and strong
translation.zh: 你的真相让你勇敢坚强

translation.en: and saps the rest of us of any kind of bravery or strength.
translation.zh: 却吸干了我们其他人的勇气或力量

translation.en: Because it's so draining, Lenny.
translation.zh: 因为这太让人精疲力竭了 莱尼

translation.en: It's so draining to love and accept someone
translation.zh: 去爱并接受一个

translation.en: who doesn't love and accept themselves.
translation.zh:
不爱也不接受自己的人
真是太累人了

translation.en: And that's the only truth I know about you.
translation.zh: 这是我所知道的关于你的唯一真相

translation.en: If you're not careful, you're going to die a lonely, old queen.
translation.zh:
如果你不当心的话
就会变成一个孤独终老的女王

translation.en: [Alexander] Mommy! Daddy!
translation.zh: 妈妈！爸爸！

translation.en: [Nina] Mom! Dad!

translation.en: -Daddy! -Mom!
translation.zh:
-爸爸！
-妈妈！

-史努比来了 快点！
-快来

translation.en: Mommy! You're missing Snoopy.

translation.en: [Alexander] What are you guys doing in there?
translation.zh: 你们俩在里头干什么呢？

translation.en: -[Nina] He's so big. -You've been in there for ages.
translation.zh:
-他好大
-你们在里头待了好久了

-爸爸！
-在

translation.en: Wonderful. Hello. Hello.

translation.en: What I love

translation.en: about these Thursday rehearsals

translation.en: is that we get a chance to talk to you about what we think of the music.

因为我们有机会跟你们谈谈
我们对音乐的看法

translation.en: So, thank you for coming and good afternoon.
translation.zh: 所以 感谢各位的到来 大家下午好

translation.en: Um, today we're studying Shostakovich's 14th Opus 135.

今天我们要学习肖斯塔科维奇的
第14号交响曲 作品135

translation.en: What I realized about this piece...

translation.en: It could be morbid, but I tend to think that it's not...
translation.zh:
或许这有点病态
但我倾向于认为它不是…

translation.en: ...is that
translation.zh: …那就是

translation.en: as death approaches...
translation.zh: 随着死亡的临近…

translation.en: I believe that an artist must
translation.zh: 我认为作为一名艺术家

translation.en: cast off anything that's restraining him.
translation.zh: 必须摆脱一切束缚他的东西

translation.en: And an artist

translation.en: must be resolute in creating, whatever time he has left,
translation.zh:
不管你还剩多少时间
都必须坚定地、在绝对自由的状态下

translation.en: in absolute freedom.
translation.zh: 进行创作

translation.en: And that's why...
translation.zh: 这就是为什么…

translation.en: I have to do this for myself,
translation.zh: 我也得为我自己做到这一点

translation.en: I have to live...

translation.en: the rest of my life, however long or short that may be,

translation.en: exactly the way that I want.

translation.en: As more and more of us are in this day and age.

就像越来越多的
生活在这个时代的人一样

translation.en: -[Leonard] Now, is it? -[Jamie] Put it on.
translation.zh:
-是吧？
-放吧

translation.en: [Leonard] Do you remember that song, dear?
translation.zh: （雪莉·埃利斯《拍手歌》） 还记得这首歌吗 亲爱的？

translation.en: -You do? -Do you guys think we do?
translation.zh:
-你记得？
-你们觉得我们会吗？

translation.en: -[Alexander] Do you remember the dance? -No.
translation.zh:
-还记得那支舞吗？
-不记得了

translation.en: -You were the worst-- -[Jamie] Do you remember the dance?
translation.zh:
-你跳得最糟…
-你记得那支舞吗？

translation.en: You were the absolute worst at it.
translation.zh: 你绝对是最差的

translation.en: ♪ The monkey chewed tobacco On the streetcar line ♪
translation.zh: 猴子在有轨电车线上嚼烟草

translation.en: ♪ The line broke, the monkey got choked ♪
translation.zh: 线断了 猴子被噎

translation.en: ♪ They all went to heaven In a little row-boat ♪
translation.zh: 他们都乘着小划艇去了天堂

translation.en: ♪ Clap-Pat Slap-Clap ♪
translation.zh: 拍呀 拍拍

translation.en: ♪ Slap-Pat Clap-Slap ♪
translation.zh: 拍呀 拍拍

translation.en: ♪ Clap-Pat ♪
translation.zh: 拍拍

translation.en: Get your hands into it.
translation.zh: 把手拍起来

translation.en: Come here, everyone.
translation.zh: 大家都过来

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: Sweet Gene, come here. Come here.
translation.zh: 吉恩宝贝 过来

translation.en: Come here. Sweet Gene, come here.
translation.zh: 过来 吉恩宝贝

translation.en: [in Spanish] Let's go to the house.
translation.zh: 我们进屋里去吧

translation.en: [Leonard in English] Where's the patient?
translation.zh: 病人在哪儿呢？

translation.en: Where is the patient?
translation.zh: 病人呢？

translation.en: The doctor is here. Hello, nurse.
translation.zh: 医生来了 你好啊 护士

translation.en: And, uh...
translation.zh: 那个…

translation.en: [whispers] I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: [weakly] You smell like...
translation.zh: 你闻上去…

translation.en: tuna fish...
translation.zh: 一股吞拿鱼味儿…

translation.en: and cigarettes.
translation.zh: 还有烟味儿

translation.en: You caught me.
translation.zh: 被你发现了

translation.en: It's horrible.
translation.zh: 难闻死了

translation.en: -[Leonard] You got it? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-行吗？
-行

translation.en: Get the bag.
translation.zh: 拿上行李

translation.en: I think the main point of this whole piece is becoming one.
translation.zh:
我觉得整部作品的要点
就是合为一个整体

translation.en: Not only the timpani in the back, but also the violins in the front.
translation.zh:
不仅包括后排的定音鼓
还包括前排的小提琴

translation.en: Have to treat them all as one organism.
translation.zh: 必须将它们视为一个有机体

translation.en: If you do that, then you can just work from there.
translation.zh:
做到了这一点
就可以在此基础上发挥

translation.en: I've got you. So don't worry.
translation.zh: 有我在呢 所以 别担心

translation.en: Okay? I'm right here. I'm gonna take you through it.
translation.zh:
好吗？我就在这儿
整个过程我都会引导你的

translation.en: -Okay? Here we go. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-好吗？开始吧
-好

translation.en: William, everybody.
translation.zh: 各位 这是威廉

translation.en: -Bar three-eleven, please. -[Leonard clears throat]
translation.zh: 请从第3-11小节开始

translation.en: One, two, three.
translation.zh: 一、二、三

translation.en: Okay. Sorry.
translation.zh: 好 不好意思

translation.en: -[clears throat] Sorry. -[music stops]
translation.zh: 打断一下

translation.en: Now that you've made it clear
translation.zh: 既然你已经通过迟滞

translation.en: that you're retarding into the fermata...
translation.zh: 清楚地表明了延长符号…

translation.en: Yeah, I'm just still unclear after--
translation.zh: 是的 我只是还不清楚这之后…

translation.en: It's fine, everything's together.
translation.zh: 挺好的 一切都很连贯

translation.en: But what happens after? What are you gonna do?
translation.zh: 但是之后呢？你打算怎么办？

translation.en: 'Cause they don't know. You gonna bleed out of it or you gonna
translation.zh: 因为他们不知道是会一泻千里呢

translation.en: drip out of it? What are you gonna do?
translation.zh: 还是如水滴一般？你打算怎么做？

translation.en: I'll do this.
translation.zh: 我会这么做

translation.en: Leak out of it. That's what it sounds like.
translation.zh: 慢慢渗出 听上去是这样

translation.en: Fermata.
translation.zh: 延迟符号

translation.en: -Bar before. -Bar before.
translation.zh:
-前面那小节
-前面那小节

translation.en: -One, two, three. -[music continues]
translation.zh: 一、二、三

translation.en: No, that's not clear.
translation.zh: 不行 不够清楚

translation.en: -[music stops] -Yeah, I didn't feel that.
translation.zh: 是呀 我没感觉

translation.en: One more time please. Sorry.
translation.zh: 请再来一次吧 不好意思

translation.en: -Shall I-- -[music continues]
translation.zh: 要我…

translation.en: Okay, that's very nice.
translation.zh: 好 这很不错

translation.en: -But that's still a bar. -[music stops]
translation.zh: 但这还是一个小节

translation.en: So, if I could just show you what I think you wanted
translation.zh:
好 我觉得我知道你要的感觉
我来做给你看

translation.en: -and if I'm wrong, you tell me. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-如果我错了 就告诉我
-好

translation.en: So think you want to do. Where you want to take it... You have to do...
translation.zh:
我觉得你想要的是这样
你想把它带到…就得…

translation.en: cut off and an upbeat.
translation.zh: 中断 然后一个弱拍

translation.en: Quarters. I think that's what you really mean.
translation.zh:
四分音符
我觉得这是你真正想表达的

translation.en: Bar before the fermata.
translation.zh: 延长符号前那个小节开始

translation.en: -Right? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-对吧？
-对

translation.en: Did I get it? What did I do?
translation.zh: 我理解得对吗？我做了什么？

translation.en: Ah, that's what I did.
translation.zh: 原来我做了这个

translation.en: That's for me or for you?
translation.zh: 掌声是给我的还是给你的？

translation.en: More.
translation.zh: 响一点

translation.en: More. More!
translation.zh: 大声点！

translation.en: That's very good. Okay.
translation.zh: 很不错 好

translation.en: Start back here. Okay, thank you.
translation.zh: 重新从这里开始 好 谢谢

translation.en: -Be kind to him. -[laughter]
translation.zh: 对他客气点

translation.en: [Leonard] If summer doesn't sing in you, then nothing sings in you,
translation.zh:
如果夏日都不在你心中歌唱
那就没什么能在你心中歌唱

translation.en: and if nothing sings in you, then you can't make music.
translation.zh:
如果没什么能在你心中歌唱
那你就无法创作音乐

translation.en: Something she told me
translation.zh: 这是她对我说的话

translation.en: when I was gloomy about something
translation.zh: 当时我因某事而沮丧

translation.en: and recited this Edna St. Vincent Millay poem,
translation.zh:
然后背诵了
埃德娜·圣文森特·米莱的这首诗

translation.en: which then became Songfest.
translation.zh: 后来那成了民谣歌唱大会

translation.en: But summer does still sing in me.
translation.zh: 不过 夏日确实还在我心中歌唱

translation.en: Not as strongly as it used to or...
translation.zh: 不如之前那么响亮 也不如…

translation.en: or as often...
translation.zh: 也不如之前那么频繁…

translation.en: but it sure does.
translation.zh: 但它还会歌唱

translation.en: If not, I would've jumped in the lake long ago.
translation.zh: 不然 很久以前我就投湖自尽了

translation.en: Any questions?
translation.zh: 有问题要问吗？
